mapper.select: select * from addresses where user_id = #{userId} order by is_default desc, create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into addresses(user_id, contact_name, contact_phone, address, building, room, is_default, create_time, update_time) values(#{userId}, #{contactName}, #{contactPhone}, #{address}, #{building}, #{room}, #{isDefault}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update addresses set contact_name = #{contactName}, contact_phone = #{contactPhone}, address = #{address}, building = #{building}, room = #{room}, is_default = #{isDefault}, update_time = now() where address_id = #{addressId}
update addresses set is_default = 0 where user_id = #{userId}
update addresses set is_default = 1 where address_id = #{addressId}
